MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Bridge Farm Drive, Hesketh Drive and surrounding areas. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:41AM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11:27AM on 26th April 2021
